class DextopCoreModule

Namespace:Codaxy.Dextop
Base:DextopModule
Dextop core module. Includes all Dextop library resources.

Fields

This class has no fields.

DextopModule
 public void RegisterNamespaceMapping(String ns, String cns)
Map C# (server) class namespace to JS (client) namespace. Use * and % to define prefix mappings.

Parameters:

  • ns: String
    Name of the C# (server) namespace. If the name ends with *, prefix match is used. If the name ends with % only that part of namespace is mapped.
  • cns: String
    Name of the JS (client) namespace.
DextopModule
